resources.name: feed-standaard
resources.title: Feed (standaardresolutie)
resources.description: Standaard feed. Items bevatten: date (ISO 8601, UTC), nlDateTime (NL weergave), range (-100..100), color (hex), past (bool).

resources.name: feed-interpolated-10
resources.title: Feed (interpolated=10)
resources.description: Hogere temporele resolutie via interpolated=10 (ongeveer elke ~6 minuten).
